reference.title: javamethod
reference.shortdesc: The <javamethod> element is a reference to a Java method.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <javamethod> element can be used to reference a Java method from another topic type.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <task id="httpxml"> <title>Getting an XML file through an HTTP connection</title> <taskbody> <steps> <step><cm>Open the connection</cm> <info>You can use <javamethod href="IDefaultComponentExportDataModel#IDefault/getManifest"> getManifest method (IDefaultComponentExportDataModel interface) </javamethod> in a Java application. </info> </step> </steps> </taskbody> </task>
